nodes.description: 警方在甘托克市Kyongsa场地周边例行巡逻时发现疑似压力锅炸弹
nodes.support_text: Policemen stumbled upon the suspected bomb during a routine combing exercise in the area at around 8 am before the arrival of the Chief Minister.

nodes.description: 爆炸物初步检查显示压力锅部分打开，内部有电线和钟表
nodes.support_text: The pressure cooker had its lid partially opened and contained wires and a clock inside it, Sikkim DIG, Police, Akshay Sachdeva told UNI.

nodes.description: 警方封锁现场并派遣警犬和特制爆炸物团队前往调查
nodes.support_text: The spot was cordoned off by the police. '' We have dispatched sniffer dogs and a special explosive team to Geyzing and awaiting confirmation from them on whether the object was actually a bomb or a dummy'', said Mr Sachdeva.

nodes.description: 位于爆炸物现场的附近学校宣布停课
nodes.support_text: The school near the Kyongsa ground was closed down for today.
We have dispatched sniffer dogs and a special explosive team to Geyzing and awaiting confirmation from them on whether the object was actually a bomb or a dummy

nodes.description: 首席部长会议按计划进行
nodes.support_text: 首席部长会议按计划进行

edges.support_text: Three hours before Sikkim Chief Minister Pawan Chamling was scheduled to address a public meeting
Sikkim DIG, Police, Akshay Sachdeva told UNI
Meanwhile, the Chief Minister's public meeting went ahead as scheduled
